page.title: 06Hyndhead Special School
page.content: Hyndhead is a school for severely mentally and physically handicapped children.The West end of Denbeath School was converted to make this school in 1983. There are nineteen children and ten staff including auxiliaries. Most of the children arrive and leave by bus but some travel by taxi. The school day begins at 9.30 am and ends at 3.00pm.The children start the school at the age of two and a half and leave when they are eighteen, but sometimes there are exceptions made. Hyndhead has many special features,including a heated swimming- pool,a housewifery flat,a gym equipped with specially adapted apparatus and an outdoor adventure playground. On our visits we found that the children were always happy and contented.
